meanings.definition: A symbol used in search queries to represent any unknown character or characters.
meanings.sent1: When searching online, you can use wildcards like '*' to find words with unknown letters.
meanings.sent2: The use of wildcards in search engines helps broaden the results.
meanings.sent3: I tried to guess the password, but the wildcards made it impossible to crack!
meanings.sent4: Her personality was like a wildcard, always surprising us with unexpected actions.
meanings.sent5: The concept of wildcards in searches is like having a secret code to unlock hidden information.

meanings.definition: A playing card that can have any value in a game.
meanings.sent1: During the game, the player drew a wildcard that could be any card they needed.
meanings.sent2: In the deck, the joker card often serves as a wildcard for various games.
meanings.sent3: The wildcard in the deck turned the tide of the game in an unexpected way.
meanings.sent4: His unpredictable strategy in the card game made him the wildcard of the group.
meanings.sent5: The wildcard in the game was like a hidden ace up his sleeve, ready to surprise everyone.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that is unpredictable or uncontrollable.
meanings.sent1: She's a wildcard in our group, you never know what she'll do next.
meanings.sent2: Dealing with a wildcard like him can be challenging due to his unpredictable nature.
meanings.sent3: His wildcards always keep us on our toes, adding excitement to our routine.
meanings.sent4: Life is full of wildcards, making each day an adventure waiting to unfold.
meanings.sent5: The unpredictable weather is a wildcard that can change our plans in an instant.
